sections.heading: or shopping bags; requirements
sections.text: On and after January 1, 1992, a person shall not sell or offer for sale at retail any bag used for or intended to be used for groceries or shopping which is constructed of a material which is not biodegradable, photodegradable, or recyclable.SourceLaws 1989, LB 325, ยง

69-2010.Grocery or shopping bags; requirements.

On and after January 1, 1992, a person shall not sell or offer for sale at retail any bag used for or intended to be used for groceries or shopping which is constructed of a material which is not biodegradable, photodegradable, or recyclable.

SourceLaws 1989, LB 325, ยง 10.
